GoalAssignmentDetail.name: GoalAssignmentDetail
GoalAssignmentDetail.description: Represents additional information associated with a GoalAssignment record.

DetailCodeId.description: The system-defined code that represents the addition information associated to a goal. This field is used to specify standardized goal outcomes as codes.

DetailRecordId.description: References clinical records that associate additional information to a goal. This information can be an outcome or an item addressed by the goal.

DetailType.description: Specifies the type of additional information associated to the goal.

GoalAssignmentId.description: References the parent goal that is associated with the additional information,

LastReferencedDate.description: The date and time when the record was last referenced.

LastViewedDate.description: The date and time when the record was last viewed.
